name: Forest Maze
description:
You are trapped inside a maze and your goal is find the exit. The doors are locked and the keys lies somewhere. Try to collect all the collectibles and leave the maze. Clicking on the final board restarts the scene.

Controls:

Windows - WASD to move and Mouse to Orbit and Click. Alt+F4 to close the game.

Android - VR Cardboard. Click on the trigger to move and rotate you head around.

In Development:

Planning to add achievements for finishing fast, collecting everything, also proper main menu and credits panel.

Credits:

Game created by Mohammed Alsayed (Mickey)
